item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:520570”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=639068.msg4307840#msg4307840 date=1370219575]

thus the leech’s of epicurus Begins MUAHAHAHAHHAHAAHHAAH!

worst part is that He is leeching the website aswell lmao
[/quote]well really…

I mean TO BE FAIR

Yanille scape owned the original rights to that template then meeper98 asked for permission to use for Myth-Scape and they were given cause they were friends with him… now he is leeching yanillescapes and really epicurus did the same

Yanille Scape did not own the rights to that template. They used HTTrack to rip RuneScape’s site.[/quote]you know what I meant , it wasn’t a released by product until people started looking at their site. :rolleyes:
